heroText: Passionate About High-Performance Applications and Technology
aboutText1: I'm a passionate Algerian Software developer with over a year of experience creating functional applications.
aboutText2: I have a second hobby which is content creating on Instagram and YouTube, where I publish videos and reels about Tech and programming which are my passionate subjects.
aboutText3: When I'm not coding or creating content, I practice sports (kickboxing or gym), reading, and learning new skills.

thanksMessage: I've received your message and will get back to you as soon as possible. In the meantime, feel free to explore more of my work or connect with me on social media.
